attributes.action: Make it Law for online retailers to label country of manufacture and despatch
attributes.additional_details: Having this information will allow us to make informed decisions on what countries we would like to support allowing us to support poorer countries and avoiding those countries that have a toxic political structure..
attributes.background: With the over reliance of products from a communist state it is very difficult to determine where a product is manufactured and despatched from, I call for online retailers to legally have to place in a prominent position on the items description where the item was made and despatched from.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309019
